showScoreExcerpt: "You need somebody adept in theatrical magic to make this dazzle...and Tiffany fits the bill perfectly...He isn't shy about going big and high-tech...As Albus, Clemmett gives a marvelously shaded performance, capturing both his pain and youthful sense of wonder. Scorpius is a much more colorful character, and Boyle goes deliciously over-the-top without ever losing this emotional thread of this lonely boy. Jennings gives his usual excellent all...Recommended."
